com.sap.cloud.sdk.services.recastai

Class RecastDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.services.recastai.RecastDialog

  • @Beta
public class RecastDialog
extends Object
    Manages the handling of a dialog in recast.

    Be aware that this class is in Beta (as indicated by the annotation) and therefore subject to breaking changes.

public DialogResponse sendInteraction(String message,

        Deprecated. This module will be discontinued, along with its classes and methods.
        Sends a message and awaits a response from the bot
        Parameters:
        message - a single message to be sent

 @Nullable
public DialogResponse sendInteraction(DialogResponseWrapper dialogResponseWrapper)
